resources.string: What song do you want? (Title and Artist)
Note: Please be patient. Your request will be processed as soon as possible. Priority will be given to songs that have more requests. Thank you.
The song is heard online. If you have it, download it with Download. Wifi is recommended both to listen and to download the songs. If you like the app, please Vote It!
The download is starting. WIFI is recommended, since that the download will be slow via 3G. Please be patient and wait for it to complete 100%. The song is saved in /sdcard. Downloading.
Do you want to rate this song?
Request accepted. In short, we will process your request
Song + 1. Thank you for your rate!
Do you like this App? Please, rate the App and helps to improve it! Thank you!
Which link is broken? (Title and Artist)
